block.p: The two services that distribute nearly all corporate press releases in the United States ended the decades-old practice of offering media organizations 15-minute advance copies. The reason: With thousands of Internet sites offering investors a chance to read the releases for themselves, financial newswires like the Dow Jones News Service are no longer the best way to ensure that all investors receive information at the same time.
